verses.verse: וְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> And when David עָבַ֤ר <WH5674> past מְעַט֙ <WH4592> was a little מֵֽהָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the top וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold צִיבָ֛א <WH6717> [of the hill] behold Ziba נַ֥עַר <WH5288> the servant מְפִי־ בֹ֖שֶׁת <WH4648> of Mephibosheth לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <WH7122> met וְצֶ֨מֶד <WH6776> him with a couple חֲמֹרִ֜ים <WH2543> of asses חֲבֻשִׁ֗ים <WH2280> saddled וַעֲלֵיהֶם֩ <WH5921> and on מָאתַ֨יִם <WH3967> and upon them two hundred לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> [loaves] of bread וּמֵאָ֧ה <WH3967> and an hundred צִמּוּקִ֛ים <WH6778> bunches of raisins וּמֵ֥אָה <WH3967> and an hundred קַ֖יִץ <WH7019> of summer fruits וְנֵ֥בֶל <WH5035> and a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> of wine

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶל־ <WH413> to צִיבָ֖א <WH6717> unto Ziba מָה־ <WH4100> Why אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> another לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said צִ֠יבָא <WH6717> What meanest thou by these? And Ziba הַחֲמוֹרִ֨ים <WH2543> The asses לְבֵית־ <WH1004> household הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> [be] for the king's לִרְכֹּ֗ב <WH7392> to ride on [וּלְהַלֶּחֶם כ] (וְהַלֶּ֤חֶם <WH3899> bread ק) וְהַקַּ֙יִץ֙ <WH7019> and summer fruit לֶאֱכ֣וֹל <WH398> to eat הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> for the young men וְהַיַּ֕יִן <WH3196> and the wine לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> may drink הַיָּעֵ֖ף <WH3287> that such as be faint בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְאַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> and where בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <WH113> And where [is] thy master's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said צִיבָ֜א <WH6717> Ziba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> Behold he abideth בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> for he said הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> To day יָשִׁ֤יבוּ <WH7725> restore לִי֙ בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> shall the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַמְלְכ֥וּת <WH4468> me the kingdom אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> of my father

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king לְצִבָ֔א <WH6717> to Ziba הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold לְךָ֔ כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לִמְפִי־ בֹ֑שֶׁת <WH4648> Behold thine [are] all that [pertained] unto Mephibosheth וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said צִיבָא֙ <WH6717> And Ziba הִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֵ֔יתִי <WH7812> I humbly אֶמְצָא־ <WH4672> beseech thee [that] I may find חֵ֥ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> O king

וּבָ֛א <WH935> came הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> And when king דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David עַד־ <WH5704> against בַּֽחוּרִ֑ים <WH980> to Bahurim וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold מִשָּׁם֩ <WH8033> there אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> a man יוֹצֵ֜א <WH3318> behold thence came out מִמִּשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> of the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> of Saul וּשְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> whose name שִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8096> [was] Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרָ֔א <WH1617> of Gera יֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> he came forth יָצ֖וֹא <WH3318> still as he came וּמְקַלֵּֽל׃ <WH7043> and cursed

וַיְסַקֵּ֤ל <WH5619> And he cast בָּֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> stones אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> at David וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַבְדֵ֖י <WH5650> and at all the servants הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגִּבֹּרִ֔ים <WH1368> and all the mighty men מִימִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> [were] on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <WH8040> and on his left

וְכֹֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> And thus said שִׁמְעִ֖י <WH8096> Shimei בְּקַֽלְל֑וֹ <WH7043> when he cursed צֵ֥א <WH3318> Come out צֵ֛א <WH3318> come out אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man הַדָּמִ֖ים <WH1818> thou bloody וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and thou man הַבְּלִיָּֽעַל׃ <WH1100> of Belial

הֵשִׁיב֩ <WH7725> hath returned עָלֶ֨יךָ <WH5921> and יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> The LORD כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> upon thee all the blood בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> of Saul אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose מָלַ֙כְתָּ֙ <WH4427> in whose stead thou hast reigned [תַּחְתֹּו כ] (תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> Thahash ק) וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> the kingdom בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH53> of Absalom בְּנֶ֑ךָ <WH1121> thy son וְהִנְּךָ֙ <WH2005> behold בְּרָ֣עָתֶ֔ךָ <WH7451> and behold thou [art taken] in thy mischief כִּ֛י <WH3588> are a אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man דָּמִ֖ים <WH1818> because thou [art] a bloody אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֲבִישַׁ֤י <WH52> Abishai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָה֙ <WH6870> of Zeruiah אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why יְקַלֵּ֞ל <WH7043> curse הַכֶּ֤לֶב <WH3611> dog הַמֵּת֙ <WH4191> Why should this dead הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֖י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אֶעְבְּרָה־ <WH5674> over נָּ֖א <WH4994> now וְאָסִ֥ירָה <WH5493> I pray thee and take off אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> his head ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מַה־ <WH4100> What לִּ֥י וְלָכֶ֖ם בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> What have I to do with you ye sons צְרֻיָ֑ה <WH6870> Zeruiah [כִּי כ] (כֹּ֣ה <WH3588> for ק) יְקַלֵּ֗ל <WH7043> unto him Curse [וְכִי כ] (כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ק) יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> because the LORD אָ֤מַר <WH559> hath said לוֹ֙ קַלֵּ֣ל <WH7043> Curse אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David וּמִ֣י <WH4310> any יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> Who shall then say מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> Why עָשִׂ֥יתָה <WH6213> Wherefore hast thou done so כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> after that ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִישַׁי֙ <WH52> to Abishai וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> and to all his servants הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold בְנִ֛י <WH1121> Behold my son אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָצָ֥א <WH3318> which came forth מִמֵּעַ֖י <WH4578> of my bowels מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> seeketh אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my life וְאַ֨ף <WH637> how כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַתָּ֜ה <WH6258> now בֶּן־ הַיְמִינִ֗י <WH1145> how much more now [may this] Benjamite הַנִּ֤חוּ <WH3240> [do it]? let him alone לוֹ֙ וִֽיקַלֵּ֔ל <WH7043> and let him curse כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָֽמַר־ <WH559> hath bidden ל֖וֹ יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> for the LORD

אוּלַ֛י <WH194> Perhaps יִרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> will look יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> It may be that the LORD [בְּעֳוֹנִי כ] (בְּעֵינִ֑י <WH5771> fault ק) וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> will requite יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> and that the LORD לִי֙ טוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> me good תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> instead קִלְלָת֖וֹ <WH7045> for his cursing הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> went along דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And as David וַאֲנָשָׁ֖יו <WH376> and his men בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way ס וְשִׁמְעִ֡י <WH8096> Shimei הֹלֵךְ֩ <WH1980> as he went בְּצֵ֨לַע <WH6763> side הָהָ֜ר <WH2022> on the hill's לְעֻמָּת֗וֹ <WH5980> over against הָלוֹךְ֙ <WH1980> went וַיְקַלֵּ֔ל <WH7043> him and cursed וַיְסַקֵּ֤ל <WH5619> and threw בָּֽאֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> stones לְעֻמָּת֔וֹ <WH5980> at וְעִפַּ֖ר <WH6080> him and cast בֶּעָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> dust פ

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> that [were] with him came הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for עֲיֵפִ֑ים <WH5889> weary וַיִּנָּפֵ֖שׁ <WH5314> and refreshed שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְאַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <WH53> And Absalom וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> came יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַאֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <WH302> and Ahithophel אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> now it

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֞א <WH935> was come חוּשַׁ֧י <WH2365> And it came to pass when Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֛י <WH757> the Archite רֵעֶ֥ה <WH7463> friend דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David's אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH53> unto Absalom וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said חוּשַׁי֙ <WH2365> that Hushai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <WH53> unto Absalom יְחִ֥י <WH2421> God save הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יְחִ֥י <WH2421> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> And Absalom אֶל־ <WH413> to חוּשַׁ֔י <WH2365> to Hushai זֶ֥ה <WH2088> is this חַסְדְּךָ֖ <WH2617> [Is] this thy kindness אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> brother לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> how long לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָלַ֖כְתָּ <WH1980> go אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> brother

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said חוּשַׁי֮ <WH2365> And Hushai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁלֹם֒ <WH53> unto Absalom לֹ֕א <WH3808> No כִּי֩ <WH3588> For אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom בָּחַ֧ר <WH977> choose יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Nay but whom the LORD וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel [לֹא כ] (לֹ֥ו <WH3808> No ק) אֶהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become וְאִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> for אֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> his will I be and with him will I abide

וְהַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> And again לְמִי֙ <WH4310> whom אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶֽעֱבֹ֔ד <WH5647> whom should I serve הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> ? [should I] not [serve] in the presence בְנ֑וֹ <WH1121> afflicted כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after עָבַ֙דְתִּי֙ <WH5647> serve לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> presence אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> in thy father's כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> so will I be in thy presence פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH53> Absalom אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחִיתֹ֑פֶל <WH302> to Ahithophel הָב֥וּ <WH3051> Give לָכֶ֛ם עֵצָ֖ה <WH6098> counsel מַֽה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> among you what we shall do

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲחִיתֹ֙פֶל֙ <WH302> And Ahithophel אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <WH53> unto Absalom בּ֚וֹא <WH935> Go in אֶל־ <WH413> about פִּלַגְשֵׁ֣י <WH6370> concubines אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> unto thy father's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הִנִּ֖יחַ <WH3240> which he hath left לִשְׁמ֣וֹר <WH8104> to keep הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> the house וְשָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> shall hear כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and all Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that נִבְאַ֣שְׁתָּ <WH887> that thou art abhorred אֶת־ <WH854> for אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְחָ֣זְק֔וּ <WH2388> of all that [are] with thee be strong יְדֵ֖י <WH3027> then shall the hands כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

וַיַּטּ֧וּ <WH5186> So they spread לְאַבְשָׁל֛וֹם <WH53> Absalom הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> a tent עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגָּ֑ג <WH1406> upon the top of the house וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> went in אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> and Absalom אֶל־ <WH413> about פִּֽלַגְשֵׁ֣י <WH6370> concubines אָבִ֔יו <WH1> unto his father's לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of all Israel

וַעֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> And the counsel אֲחִיתֹ֗פֶל <WH302> of Ahithophel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which יָעַץ֙ <WH3289> which he counselled בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> in those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יִשְׁאַל־ <WH7592> had enquired (אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> he ק) בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> at the oracle הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so כָּל־ <WH3605> was all עֲצַ֣ת <WH6098> so [was] all the counsel אֲחִיתֹ֔פֶל <WH302> of Ahithophel גַּם־ <WH1571> both לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> both with David גַּ֥ם <WH1571> both לְאַבְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <WH53> and with Absalom ס
